idea-plugin.name: IntelliJ Fortnox utilities
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin is intended to help with mundane tasks we often do on Fortnox.
Right now there are not alot of features. If you have an idea about what could be added DM me on Slack @ Jesper Holmstr√∂m

Setup (for generating auth headers):

  • Go to Settings > Tools > Fortnox utility settings and enter your default tenantId and userId to be used when generating auth headers.

Features:

  • Alt+Enter on a step in a story file to create step definition.
  • Alt+Enter in a .http file to generate auth headers for internalapi requests.
